thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Geoffrey Thurston
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Geoffrey Thurston

author: Geoffrey Thurston
title: Geoffrey Thurston
text: It was hassle free from start to finish. Everything was done with the minimum of fuss, from the pick up at the airport, sorting out documentation with the pleasant and friendly administrator and then getting the vehicle sorted. All took about half an hour. Thanks Omega Rental Cars, we will definitely use your services again. Plus your rates are not exorbitant like other car rental firms.
